confirmDeleteBookmark.message: Are you sure you want to delete the $bookmarkName$ bookmark?

confirmDeleteFolder.message: Are you sure you want to delete the $folderName$ folder?

confirmDeleteFolderSubfolders.message: Are you sure you want to delete the $folderName$ folder and $subFolderCount$ sub-folder(s) in it?

confirmDeleteFolderBookmarks.message: Are you sure you want to delete the $folderName$ folder and $bookmarkCount$ bookmark(s) in it?

confirmDeleteFolderSubfoldersBookmarks.message: Are you sure you want to delete the $folderName$ folder, $subFolderCount$ sub-folder(s) and $bookmarkCount$ bookmark(s) in it?

confirmOpenBookmarks.description: Confirmation message for opening all bookmarks.

confirmOpenBookmarksNewWindow.description: Confirmation message for opening all bookmarks in a new window.
confirmOpenBookmarksNewWindow.message: Are you sure you want to open all $count$ bookmarks in a new window?

confirmUpdateBookmark.message: Are you sure you want to update bookmark $bookmarkName$ to $newURL$?

extDesc.message: Quick and compact access to your bookmarks.

noTitle.description: The title for untitled bookmarks with no http(s) URL or untitled folders.
